alert.note: Alert for Donley; Gray (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued December 12 at 10:01PM CST until December 12 at 10:30PM CST by NWS Amarillo
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1030 PM CST FOR GRAY AND NORTHERN DONLEY COUNTIES... At 1001 PM CST, a severe thunderstorm was located 7 miles southwest of Lefors, or 11 miles south of Pampa, moving northeast at 75 mph. HAZARD...Quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Damage to vehicles is expected. Locations impacted include... Pampa, Mclean, Lefors, Howardwick, Lake Mcclellan, Kingsmill, Alanreed and Greenbelt Lake. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 100 AM CST for the Panhandle of Texas. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
